Class Zebra

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Zebra
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides the capability to create and manage zenon signaling object called Zebra

    ZenonSDKv1.0
    Author:
    Pankaj Sharma (pankajs@requestec.com)
